name: Shared-house wordpress plugin
tagline: Wordpress plugin for Shared-house.com booking calendar
body:
This project is about the Wordpress plugin for [Shared-house.com](http://www.shared-house.com/index.php?&langue=en) booking calendar.

The plugin allows to easily display the booking calendar on a Wordpress site. The plugin homepage and dwnload information can be found here: [http://www.shared-house.com/free-booking-calendar.php](http://www.shared-house.com/free-booking-calendar.php)

However a number of improvements need to be made, for instance:
- The ability to link to an internal page of the wordpress site instead of the calendar page on shared-house.com
- the ability to include several calendars with different ad numbers
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
